desc: Remove access to a canvas for specified entities

token.desc: Authentication token bearing required scopes. Tokens should be passed as an HTTP Authorization header or alternatively, as a POST parameter.

channel_ids.desc: List of channels you wish to update access for

user_ids.desc: List of users you wish to update access for

failed_to_update_channel_ids.desc: The channel IDs that could not be updated

failed_to_update_user_ids.desc: The user IDs that could not be updated

canvas_not_found.desc: The canvas you wish to revoke permissions for is not available.

restricted_action.desc: User does not have permission to perform this action.

canvas_disabled_user_team.desc: Canvas is disabled on user's team.

invalid_parameters.desc: One of user_ids and channel_ids must be defined.

channel_not_found.desc: A channel could not be found.

user_not_found.desc: A user could not be found.

error.description: Typical error response when attempting to change the access of a channel canvas
